players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it."
You: "Bob claims to have investigated Charlie, but we should consider all possibilities before deciding. Charlie, do you have anything to say in your defense?"
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide. I was innocent during the night and have no reason to harm anyone. Let's focus on finding the real killer instead of making baseless accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
